description:
An update for “Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition” is now available from Nintendo eShop.
All customers who own a copy of “Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition” should download the update which includes a codebase update that brings additional features and content in close parity to the MCPE version 1.1.5, which includes the Woodland mansion and various bug fixes. Please make sure to apply this update for an improved experience on Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS Edition.
name:
Minecraft: New Nintendo 3DS 
Edition Update Ver. 1.9
